name: Verify a customer can view their transaction history
description: This test verifies that a logged-in customer can view their transaction history, including a recent Credit transaction of 300.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that a logged-in customer can view their transaction history, including a recent Credit transaction of 300.
statusMessage: Transactions table should contain a Credit transaction with amount 300. expected [true] but found [false]

steps.name: Click Customer Login button to open client portal
Check that the transactions table is visible
Get number of rows currently visible in transaction table
Verify there is a transaction with amount 300 and type Credit

attachments.name: Screenshot: Transaction history - table or row missing
